name: Wildland Wanderer
description:
You find yourself stranded on an island, and must explore these unknown lands to survive. You'll gather items to defend yourself against a cast of strange creatures, and unlock new abilities to make exploring easier.

How to play

Controller: Use the left stick / dpad to move, 'A' to jump, 'X'  to attack, 'B' to dash, 'Y' to use an item, 'RB' and 'LB' to switch items, 'Start' to pause.

Keyboard: Use the arrow keys to move, 'Space' to jump, 'X'  to attack, 'V' to dash, 'C' to use an item, 'S' and 'F' to switch items, 'P' to pause.

Made by

This game was made for Metroidvania Month 14 - itch.io.

All art, music, sound, programming and game design was made by Yann Dupont, during the jam. Exceptions are:

  • Kenney (Input Prompts)

Thank you to them !
